verses.verse: וַיְהִי֩ <WH1961> become כְּכַלּ֨וֹת <WH3615> had made an end יִרְמְיָ֜הוּ <WH3414> And it came to pass [that] when Jeremiah לְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> of speaking אֶל־ <WH413> about כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָעָ֗ם <WH5971> unto all the people אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all דִּבְרֵי֙ <WH1697> all the words יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֔ם <WH430> their God אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> whom שְׁלָח֛וֹ <WH7971> had sent יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> for which the LORD אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֖ם <WH430> their God אֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <WH413> about אֵ֥ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַדְּבָרִ֖ים <WH1697> him to them [even] all these words הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <WH428> these ס

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> Then spake עֲזַרְיָ֤ה <WH5838> Azariah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son הוֹשַֽׁעְיָה֙ <WH1955> of Hoshaiah וְיוֹחָנָ֣ן <WH3110> and Johanan בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son קָרֵ֔חַ <WH7143> of Kareah וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הָאֲנָשִׁ֖ים <WH376> men הַזֵּדִ֑ים <WH2086> and all the proud אֹמְרִ֣ים <WH559> saying אֶֽל־ <WH413> to יִרְמְיָ֗הוּ <WH3414> unto Jeremiah שֶׁ֚קֶר <WH8267> falsely אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> You מְדַבֵּ֔ר <WH1696> Thou speakest לֹ֣א <WH3808> has not שְׁלָחֲךָ֞ <WH7971> hath not sent יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֙ינוּ֙ <WH430> our God לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> thee to say לֹֽא־ <WH3808> are not תָבֹ֥אוּ <WH935> Go מִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> not into Egypt לָג֥וּר <WH1481> to sojourn שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> in it

כִּ֗י <WH3588> but בָּרוּךְ֙ <WH1263> But Baruch בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son נֵ֣רִיָּ֔ה <WH5374> of Neriah מַסִּ֥ית <WH5496> setteth thee on אֹתְךָ֖ <WH853> בָּ֑נוּ לְמַעַן֩ <WH4616> against us for to תֵּ֨ת <WH5414> deliver אֹתָ֤נוּ <WH853> בְיַֽד־ <WH3027> us into the hand הַכַּשְׂדִּים֙ <WH3778> of the Chaldeans לְהָמִ֣ית <WH4191> that they might put us to death אֹתָ֔נוּ <WH853> וּלְהַגְל֥וֹת <WH1540> and carry us away captives אֹתָ֖נוּ <WH853> בָּבֶֽל׃ <WH894> into Babylon

וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> did not שָׁמַע֩ <WH8085> obeyed יוֹחָנָ֨ן <WH3110> So Johanan בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son קָרֵ֜חַ <WH7143> of Kareah וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all שָׂרֵ֧י <WH8269> and all the captains הַחֲיָלִ֛ים <WH2428> of the forces וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> and all the people בְּק֣וֹל <WH6963> not the voice יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD לָשֶׁ֖בֶת <WH3427> to dwell בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> in the land יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> of Judah

וַיִּקַּ֞ח <WH3947> took יוֹחָנָ֤ן <WH3110> But Johanan בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son קָרֵ֙חַ֙ <WH7143> of Kareah וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all שָׂרֵ֣י <WH8269> and all the captains הַחֲיָלִ֔ים <WH2428> of the forces אֵ֖ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> the entire שְׁאֵרִ֣ית <WH7611> all the remnant יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> of Judah אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who שָׁ֗בוּ <WH7725> that were returned מִכָּל־ <WH3605> all הַגּוֹיִם֙ <WH1471> from all nations אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> to which נִדְּחוּ־ <WH5080> whither they had been driven שָׁ֔ם <WH8033> order לָג֖וּר <WH1481> to dwell בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> in the land יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> of Judah

אֶֽת־ <WH853> הַ֠גְּבָרִים <WH1397> [Even] men וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַנָּשִׁ֣ים <WH802> and women וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַטַּף֮ <WH2945> and children וְאֶת־ <WH853> בְּנ֣וֹת <WH1323> daughters הַמֶּלֶךְ֒ <WH4428> and the king's וְאֵ֣ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and every הַנֶּ֗פֶשׁ <WH5315> and every person אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> after הִנִּ֙יחַ֙ <WH3240> had left נְבוּזַרְאֲדָ֣ן <WH5018> that Nebuzaradan רַב־ <WH7227> the captain טַבָּחִ֔ים <WH2876> of the guard אֶת־ <WH854> with גְּדַלְיָ֖הוּ <WH1436> with Gedaliah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אֲחִיקָ֣ם <WH296> of Ahikam בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son שָׁפָ֑ן <WH8227> of Shaphan וְאֵת֙ <WH853> יִרְמְיָ֣הוּ <WH3414> and Jeremiah הַנָּבִ֔יא <WH5030> the prophet וְאֶת־ <WH853> בָּר֖וּךְ <WH1263> and Baruch בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son נֵרִיָּֽהוּ׃ <WH5374> of Neriah

וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <WH935> So they came אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> into the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> of Egypt כִּ֛י <WH3588> for לֹ֥א <WH3808> did not שָׁמְע֖וּ <WH8085> for they obeyed בְּק֣וֹל <WH6963> not the voice יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <WH935> thus came עַד־ <WH5704> far תַּחְפַּנְחֵֽס׃ <WH8471> they [even] to Tahpanhes ס

וַיְהִ֤י <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> Then came the word יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD אֶֽל־ <WH413> to יִרְמְיָ֔הוּ <WH3414> unto Jeremiah בְּתַחְפַּנְחֵ֖ס <WH8471> in Tahpanhes לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

קַ֣ח <WH3947> Take בְּיָדְךָ֞ <WH3027> in thine hand אֲבָנִ֣ים <WH68> stones גְּדֹל֗וֹת <WH1419> great וּטְמַנְתָּ֤ם <WH2934> and hide בַּמֶּ֙לֶט֙ <WH4423> them in the clay בַּמַּלְבֵּ֔ן <WH4404> in the brickkiln אֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> which בְּפֶ֥תַח <WH6607> which [is] at the entry בֵּית־ <WH1004> house פַּרְעֹ֖ה <WH6547> of Pharaoh's בְּתַחְפַּנְחֵ֑ס <WH8471> in Tahpanhes לְעֵינֵ֖י <WH5869> in the sight אֲנָשִׁ֥ים <WH582> of the men יְהוּדִֽים׃ <WH3064> of Judah

וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <WH559> And say אֲלֵיהֶ֡ם <WH413> to כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַר֩ <WH559> unto them Thus saith יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֜וֹת <WH6635> of hosts אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel הִנְנִ֤י <WH2005> I am going שֹׁלֵ֙חַ֙ <WH7971> Behold I will send וְ֠לָקַחְתִּי <WH3947> and take אֶת־ <WH853> נְבוּכַדְרֶאצַּ֤ר <WH5019> Nebuchadrezzar מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> the king בָּבֶל֙ <WH894> of Babylon עַבְדִּ֔י <WH5650> my servant וְשַׂמְתִּ֣י <WH7760> and will set כִסְא֔וֹ <WH3678> his throne מִמַּ֛עַל <WH4605> upon לָאֲבָנִ֥ים <WH68> these stones הָאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> these אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> i טָמָ֑נְתִּי <WH2934> that I have hid וְנָטָ֥ה <WH5186> and he shall spread אֶת־ <WH853> [שַׁפְרוּרֹו כ] (שַׁפְרִירֹ֖ו <WH8237> royal pavilion ק) עֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH5921> over

[וּבָאָה כ] (וּבָ֕א <WH935> abide ק) וְהִכָּ֖ה <WH5221> he shall smite אֶת־ <WH853> אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> of Egypt אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> who לַמָּ֣וֶת <WH4194> [and deliver] such [as are] for death לַמָּ֗וֶת <WH4194> to death וַאֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> who לַשְּׁבִי֙ <WH7628> and such [as are] for captivity לַשֶּׁ֔בִי <WH7628> to captivity וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who לַחֶ֖רֶב <WH2719> and such [as are] for the sword לֶחָֽרֶב׃ <WH2719> to the sword

וְהִצַּ֣תִּי <WH3341> And I will kindle אֵ֗שׁ <WH784> a fire בְּבָתֵּי֙ <WH1004> in the houses אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> of the gods מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> of Egypt וּשְׂרָפָ֖ם <WH8313> and he shall burn וְשָׁבָ֑ם <WH7617> them and carry them away captives וְעָטָה֩ <WH5844> and he shall array אֶת־ <WH854> with אֶ֨רֶץ <WH776> himself with the land מִצְרַ֜יִם <WH4714> of Egypt כַּאֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after יַעְטֶ֤ה <WH5844> putteth on הָֽרֹעֶה֙ <WH7462> as a shepherd אֶת־ <WH853> בִּגְד֔וֹ <WH899> his garment וְיָצָ֥א <WH3318> and he shall go forth מִשָּׁ֖ם <WH8033> there בְּשָׁלֽוֹם׃ <WH7965> from thence in peace

וְשִׁבַּ֗ר <WH7665> He shall break אֶֽת־ <WH853> מַצְּבוֹת֙ <WH4676> also the images בֵּ֣ית שֶׁ֔מֶשׁ <WH1053> of Bethshemesh אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> that [is] in the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> of Egypt וְאֶת־ <WH853> בָּתֵּ֥י <WH1004> and the houses אֱלֹהֵֽי־ <WH430> of the gods מִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> of the Egyptians יִשְׂרֹ֥ף <WH8313> shall he burn בָּאֵֽשׁ׃ <WH784> with fire ס
